exceptions.tactic: intros xs p ys net st' ps' gd d l HAE HAEr HRV HRVR HMsg HUpdate HP HIR HIR' HIR'' HPacket HState' HSend HIH.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
P: network -> Prop

Goal:
forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote' P -> msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' P -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (snd (pBody p)) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = (d, l) -> update_elections_data_net (pDst p) (pSrc p) (snd (pBody p)) (nwState net (pDst p)) = gd -> P net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |} -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : Net.name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) (gd, d) h) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys) \/ In p' (send_packets (pDst p) (add_ghost_msg (pDst p) (gd, d) l))) -> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
pDst = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, pDst, _) := p in pDst : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.name Arguments pDst {P params}
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
msg_refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}

data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope

handleMessage = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (src me : name) (m : msg) (state : raft_data) => match m with | RequestVote t _ lastLogIndex lastLogTerm => let (st, r) := handleRequestVote me state t src lastLogIndex lastLogTerm in (st, [(src, r)]) | RequestVoteReply t voteGranted => (handleRequestVoteReply me state src t voteGranted, []) | AppendEntries t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit => let (st, r) := handleAppendEntries me state t lid prevLogIndex prevLog

update_elections_data_net = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => match m with | RequestVote t _ lastLogIndex lastLogTerm => update_elections_data_requestVote me src t src lastLogIndex lastLogTerm st | RequestVoteReply t voteGranted => update_elections_data_requestVoteReply me src t voteGranted st | AppendEntries t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit => update_elections_data_appendEntries me st t lid
